SEARCH
Package Interface.Server

Interface LobbyInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket, Lobby, Network
public interface LobbyInterface extends Remote
The LobbyInterface interface represents a remote interface for lobby operations. It defines methods for retrieving lobby information, setting lobby size, logging in/out of a lobby, and pinging players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    getLobbyInfo(RemoteView remote)
    Retrieves lobby information and sends it to the remote view.
    void
    login(String playerID, String lobbyID, RemoteView remoteView, RemoteClient network)
    Logs a player into a lobby and associates the remote view and remote client with the player.
    void
    logOut(String playerID, String lobbyID)
    Logs a player out of a lobby.
    void
    ping(String playerID, String lobbyID)
    Sends a ping message to the specified player in the lobby.
    void
    setLobbySize(String playerID, String lobbyID, int lobbySize)
    Sets the lobby size for the specified lobby.

  • Method Details

    • getLobbyInfo

      void getLobbyInfo(RemoteView remote) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves lobby information and sends it to the remote view.
      Parameters:
      remote - the remote view to receive the lobby information.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • setLobbySize

      void setLobbySize(String playerID, String lobbyID, int lobbySize) throws RemoteException
      Sets the lobby size for the specified lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player setting the lobby size.
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby to set the size for.
      lobbySize - the size to set for the lobby.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • login

      void login(String playerID, String lobbyID, RemoteView remoteView, RemoteClient network) throws RemoteException
      Logs a player into a lobby and associates the remote view and remote client with the player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player to log in.
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby to log into.
      remoteView - the remote view associated with the player.
      network - the remote client associated with the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • ping

      void ping(String playerID, String lobbyID) throws RemoteException
      Sends a ping message to the specified player in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player to ping.
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby where the player is located.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • logOut

      void logOut(String playerID, String lobbyID) throws RemoteException
      Logs a player out of a lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player to log out.
      lobbyID - the ID of the lobby to log out from.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
